hero.headline: Tailor your resume to every vacancy — fast.
hero.subheadline: Upload a DOCX or PDF, review the structured result, generate ATS + human-friendly versions, and export clean PDFs.

comparison.title: ATS vs Human Resume
comparison.subtitle: ApplyKit keeps the content consistent between both versions — only the presentation changes.

human.title: Human Resume
human.point3: Best when recruiter asks for a "nice PDF"

apiKey.question: Is it safe to paste my API key?
apiKey.answer: You can use the free tier, or bring your own key. Keys are treated as sensitive. Prefer temporary keys.

atsPlain.question: Why does my ATS resume look plain?
atsPlain.answer: That's intentional: ATS parsers prefer predictable structure.

editing.question: Can I edit the result?
editing.answer: Yes — MVP uses a JSON editor. A friendly UI editor comes later.

formats.question: DOCX or PDF?
formats.answer: DOCX is preferred, but PDF parsing is supported too.
